content: CHICAGO (Reuters Breakingviews) - Nelson Peltz has brought his activist record full circle. At the billionaire activist's recommendation  PepsiCo has agreed to add Bill Johnson to its board. The former Heinz boss tussled with Peltz in 2006 but later became an adviser to his Trian fund. Johnson's evolution from adversary to ally shows why even activists should try to win friends  not make enemies.
name: Pepsico Inc
title: Breakingviews: Former Peltz adversary comes full circle at Pepsi
